questions.question: Who created the World Space Week?
World Space Week was created to celebrate _______.

choices.answer: writers for giving us fantasy books
space science & tech for the improvement of human condition
new tech for films that are about outer space

questions.question: Space Week is every year on October 4-10 to honor that in those two days great events happened:

choices.answer: the week when Bruce Willis saved us from a huge asteroid
the moon landing and the discovery of Pluto
the launch of Sputnik and Signing of Outer Space Treaty
the first days that aliens sought contact with earth

space agencies, schools, planetaria, museums, astronomyclubs
